sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card
      class="ma-4"
      elevation="1"
      dark
  >
    <v-img
        height="10vh"
        src="https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/cards/cooking.png"
    >

    <v-card-title>Create and customize your own chat room!</v-card-title>

    <v-divider class="mx-4"></v-divider>

    <v-card-actions>
      <v-btn
          color="deep-purple lighten-2"
          text
          @click="reserve"
      >
        Create Room
      </v-btn>
    </v-card-actions>
    </v-img>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'CreateRoomCard',
  data: () => ({
    loading: false,
    selection: 1,
  }),

  methods: {
    reserve () {
      this.loading = true

      setTimeout(() => (this.loading = false), 2000)
    },
  },
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
